Articles.Content: how do i attach a payload to the back of the aeris 4a? what is the limit of the payload?

Considering that the Aeris4a just barely makes it to orbit and back, I don't think you can add much payload to it without upgrading it with additional rocket engines and rocket fuel.

The inline docking port on top can't be used to attach a payload in the hangar, because you can't open it during construction mode. Docking a payload on the ground would be quite insane, unless you use some mod like Damned Robotics which allows you to build a controlable crane. Your best bet would be to use a radial decoupler to attach the payload to the fuselage.
